meta.videoTitle: Fitness Toolkit: Protocol & Tools to Optimize Physical Health

title_en: InsideTracker, ROKA, Helix Sleep, Momentous Supplements
title_zh:
InsideTracker, ROKA, Helix Sleep, Momentous Supplements

InsideTracker, ROKA, Helix Sleep, Momentous Supplements

paragraphList.text_en: InsideTracker, ROKA, Helix Sleep, and Momentous Supplements are four prominent brands that focus on enhancing various aspects of health and well-being for consumers. These brands offer innovative products and services aimed at improving metabolic health, vision performance, sleep quality, and nutritional supplementation.
paragraphList.text_zh: InsideTracker、ROKA、Helix Sleep 和Momentous Supplements 是四个专注于增强消费者健康和福祉各个方面的知名品牌。这些品牌提供的创新产品和服务旨在改善新陈代谢健康、视觉性能、睡眠质量和营养补充。

paragraphList.text_en: InsideTracker is a personalized nutrition platform that utilizes blood and DNA analysis to provide individuals with insights into their body and help them reach their health goals. By analyzing metabolic factors, lipids, and hormones, InsideTracker offers personalized recommendations for lifestyle changes, nutrition adjustments, and supplementation to optimize health outcomes.
paragraphList.text_zh: InsideTracker是一个个性化的营养平台，利用血液和DNA分析为个人提供对身体的洞察，并帮助他们达到健康目标。通过分析代谢因子、脂质和激素，InsideTracker提供个性化建议，包括生活方式改变、营养调整和补充，以优化健康结果。

paragraphList.text_en: ROKA, founded by former Stanford swimmers, specializes in high-quality eyeglasses and sunglasses designed for performance. Their products are crafted to provide crystal-clear vision in various conditions, catering to the needs of athletes and individuals seeking optimal visual clarity. The lightweight and durable design of ROKA eyeglasses make them suitable for activities like cycling and running, ensuring a comfortable and secure fit.
paragraphList.text_zh: ROKA由前斯坦福大学游泳运动员创立，专门设计用于运动的高质量眼镜和太阳镜。他们的产品经过精心制作，能够提供在各种条件下清晰的视野，满足运动员和追求最佳视觉清晰度的个人的需求。ROKA眼镜的轻便耐用设计使其适用于自行车骑行和跑步等活动，确保舒适紧密的配戴。

paragraphList.text_en: Helix Sleep offers customized mattresses and pillows tailored to individual sleep preferences. By taking a brief quiz on their website, customers can find the ideal mattress based on factors such as sleeping position and temperature preferences. Quality sleep is emphasized as a fundamental aspect of mental and physical health, and Helix Sleep aims to enhance sleep quality by providing personalized sleep solutions.
paragraphList.text_zh: Helix Sleep提供定制床垫和枕头，能够根据个人的睡眠喜好来定制。顾客可以通过在他们的网站上进行简短的问卷调查，找到基于睡姿和温度偏好等因素的理想床垫。优质的睡眠被强调为精神和身体健康的基本因素，Helix Sleep旨在通过提供个性化的睡眠方案来提升睡眠质量。

paragraphList.text_en: Momentous Supplements, a partner of the Huberman Lab podcast, offers a range of high-quality nutritional supplements to support various health goals. With a focus on transparency and effectiveness, Momentous Supplements provide consumers with access to supplements discussed on the podcast, promoting overall well-being and performance.
paragraphList.text_zh: 重要补充剂是Huberman实验室播客的合作伙伴，提供一系列高质量的营养补充剂，以支持各种健康目标。重要补充剂专注于透明度和有效性，为消费者提供在播客中讨论的补充剂，促进整体健康和表现。

paragraphList.text_en: Overall, these brands prioritize consumer health and well-being by offering personalized solutions to enhance metabolic health, vision performance, sleep quality, and nutritional supplementation. Through their innovative products and services, InsideTracker, ROKA, Helix Sleep, and Momentous Supplements contribute to the promotion of holistic wellness and strive to empower individuals to make informed choices for their health.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总的来说，这些品牌通过提供个性化的解决方案来优先考虑消费者的健康和幸福，以增强代谢健康、视力表现、睡眠质量和营养补充为目标。通过他们创新的产品和服务，InsideTracker、ROKA、Helix Sleep和Momentous Supplements为全面健康的促进做出贡献，并努力赋予个人为他们的健康做出明智选择的能力。
